00423 #define EXP_OP_CASE     0x2d

00432 #define EXPR_IS_MEASURABLE(x)      (((SUPPL_OP( x->suppl ) != EXP_OP_NONE) && \
00433                                      (SUPPL_OP( x->suppl ) != EXP_OP_LAST) && \
00434                                      (SUPPL_OP( x->suppl ) != EXP_OP_COND_SEL) && \
00435                                      (SUPPL_OP( x->suppl ) != EXP_OP_CASE) && \
00436                                      (SUPPL_OP( x->suppl ) != EXP_OP_CASEX) && \
00437                                      (SUPPL_OP( x->suppl ) != EXP_OP_CASEZ) && \
00438                                      !((SUPPL_IS_ROOT( x->suppl ) == 0) && \
00439                                        ((SUPPL_OP( x->suppl ) == EXP_OP_SIG) || \
00440                                         (SUPPL_OP( x->suppl ) == EXP_OP_SBIT_SEL) || \
00441                                         (SUPPL_OP( x->suppl ) == EXP_OP_MBIT_SEL)) && \
00442                                        (SUPPL_OP( x->parent->expr->suppl ) != EXP_OP_COND)) && \
00443                                      (SUPPL_OP( x->suppl ) != EXP_OP_DELAY)) ? 1 : 0)
00444 
00449 #define EXPR_COMB_MISSED(x)        (EXPR_IS_MEASURABLE(x) & (~SUPPL_WAS_TRUE(x->suppl) | ~SUPPL_WAS_FALSE(x->suppl)))
